text: If I Were for Real may refer to: *If I Were for Real (play), a 1979 Chinese play by Sha Yexin, Li Shoucheng and Yao Mingde *If I Were for Real (film), a 1981 Taiwanese film directed by Wang Toon, based on the play *If I Were for Real (album), a 1981 Mandopop album by Teresa Teng, whose title track was the theme song of the film
title: If I Were for Real
